title: ‘Big Short’ investor Michael Burry closes his hedge fund

title: Japanese Chip Sector’s Earnings Show AI Appetite, Auto Slump
description: Artificial intelligence fueled a stronger-than-expected earnings season for Japan’s tech sector, with surging data-center demand prompting chipmakers and equipment suppliers to raise forecasts.
content:

title: Humanoid Robot Falls on Its Face, Company 'Puzzled' by Global Concern
description: The debut of a humanoid robot driven by artificial intelligence at a technology event in Moscow literally fell flat on its face.
content:
The debut of a humanoid robot driven by artificial intelligence at a technology event in Moscow literally fell flat on its face.
Russian company AIDOL unveiled its creation, which also goes by the same name, at a show on Tuesday, Nov. 11, according t... [2130 chars]

title: Impact of artificial intelligence on health care and life
description: SC doctor describes how AI has a chance to improve primary care medicine with improved documentation, diagnostics and patient engagement.
content:
Like many of you, I am struggling to understand the impact artificial intelligence will have on my life and on my neighbors around the globe.
I’ve read some articles and listened to many podcasts about AI. I’ve heard opinions from the sanguine to the... [3968 chars]

title: Trump administration bets big on nuclear power as AI drives soaring energy demand
description: Artificial intelligence and data centers place a new strain on the nation’s power grid.
content:
As artificial intelligence and data centers place new strain on the nation’s power grid, the Trump administration is moving aggressively to expand America’s nuclear energy capacity.

title: Mira Murati's Thinking Machines seeks $50 billion valuation in funding talks, Bloomberg News reports
description: Thinking Machines Lab, the artificial intelligence startup founded by former OpenAI executive Mira Murati, is in early talks to raise a new funding round at a roughly $50 billion valuation, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.
content:
Nov 13 (Reuters) - Thinking Machines Lab, the artificial intelligence startup founded by former OpenAI executive Mira Murati, is in early talks to raise a new funding round at a roughly $50 billion valuation, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.

title: Eva has entered the chat: Ohio debuts AI election assistant
description: Ohio is rolling out Eva, an assistant powered by artificial intelligence that was built to help county election officials navigate the state’s election rules in seconds.
content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio -- When Ohio’s local election officials have a question about how to handle a ballot issue or process a voter file, they no longer have to dig through manuals.
They can ask Eva.
